text: Anal, avarutaiya camukattaril kahpirkalay irunta talaivarkalum innum iruti tirppu nalai cantippataip poyppatutta murpattarkale avarkalum, nam avarkalukku ivvulaka valkkaiyil vicalamana (cakanupavankalaik) kotuttiruntome avarkalum, (tam camukattaritam)"ivar unkalaip ponra oru manitareyanri verillai ninkal unpataiye avarum unkirar; ninkal kutippataiye avarum kutikkirar
